soc_scenario.description: Naturalized - without human impacts on river flow.
Constant human impacts - present-day (year-2000) dams and water use.
Time-varying human impacts - time-varying historical dam construction and water use.
Natural vegetation reference run.
Fixed year-2005 land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input.
Constant pre-industrial (1860) land use, nitrogen deposition, and fertilizer input.
Varying historical land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input.

Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP8.5.
Land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input fixed at year 2100 levels according to RCP2.6 in 2100.

Fixed year-2005 land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input. In addition, model usually plants the same tree species again or allows for regeneration of the same species. (in Forestry sector)

forest_stand.title: Hyytiälä
forest_stand.comment: Note that an experimental plot of pine contains a lot of data while footprint of flux tower is larger. Please note that the deciduous admixtures only appear in the data at a later stage and hence do not need to be simulated. Only simulate pine and spruce (no hard-woods) and regenerate as pure pine stand

forest_stand.title: Peitz
forest_stand.comment: Managed using a weak thinning from below.

forest_stand.title: Kranzberg Roof Project
forest_stand.comment: Unmanaged/ thinning from below in past 20 years for all species.

sens_scenario.description: Sensitivity experiment with CO2 concentration fixed at 2005 levels at 378.81ppm.

climate_scenario.description: Historical climate as simulated by the GCMs.

Repeating climate between 2270 and 2299 for additional 200 years up to 2500 (or equilibrium if possible), CO2 fixed at year 2299 levels.

bias_adjustment.description: No bias correction was performed on the climate data.
